title: Mood dyads
description: a dyad is a combination of any two emotions. Based on Robert Plutchik's theory of the 8 basic emotions.

emotion_member_1.description: a word to describe the emotion the person is feeling the most.  Based on Robert Plutchik's theory of the 8 basic emotions.

emotion_member_2.description: a word to describe the emotion the person is feeling the most.  Based on Robert Plutchik's theory of the 8 basic emotions.

level.description: dyad level, from often felt (1) to seldom felt (3)
